mapper.insert: insert into goods(goods_name, goods_price, goods_quantity) value( #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsQuantity} )

insert into image(goods_img , goods_detail_img1, goods_detail_img2, goods_detail_img3, goods_detail_img4, goods_detail_img5 ) value (#{goodsImg}, #{goodsDetailImg1}, #{goodsDetailImg2}, #{goodsDetailImg3}, #{goodsDetailImg4}, #{goodsDetailImg5})
mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_num, c.category_name, g.goods_name ,g.goods_price, g.goods_quantity FROM goods g JOIN category c ON g.category_num = c.category_num order by g.goods_num;
select c.category_num,g.goods_name, g.goods_price, g.goods_quantity from goods g join category c on g.category_num = c.category_num where goods_num = #{goodsNum}
